list_definition.definition: to make a sudden, violent attempt to hurt or damage

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He attacked me with a knife
The village was attacked from the air.
The Prime Minister’s policy was attacked in the newspapers.

list_definition.definition: (in games) to attempt to score a goal

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Real Madrid were attacking the Barcelona goal.

list_definition.definition: to make a vigorous start on

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: It’s time we attacked that pile of work.

list_definition.definition: an act or the action of attacking

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The brutal attack killed the old man
They made an air attack on the town.
